examples.example: 新年到了，到处都充满了欢乐祥和的气氛。

translate.english: When the New Year arrives, everywhere is filled with a happy and peaceful atmosphere.

examples.example: 新年伊始，大家都怀揣着美好的憧憬和希望开启新的征程。

translate.english: At the beginning of the new year, everyone starts a new journey with beautiful visions and hopes.

examples.example: 新年之际，人们都开心地聚在一起憧憬着未来的美好生活。

translate.english: On the occasion of the New Year, people happily gather together and look forward to the beautiful life in the future.
